nodes.text: Fungus droids were a type of small fungus-shaped espionage droids created by the New Republic during the Yuuzhan Vong War. The fungus droids were dispatched on Coruscant and other terraformed worlds. Each droid was mobile enough to insinuate itself near Yuuzhan Vong bases, and carried a collection of recorders and transmitters to beam information back to Republic agents.
